forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High 13C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High around 55F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. W winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 53F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
